Data.

Definition at line 520 of file security.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Mode & PREFIX_NAME )
                        {
                              $Data = array();
                              if( $Mode & POST )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_POST );
                              }
                              if( $Mode & GET )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_GET );
                              }
                              if( $Mode & COOKIE )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_COOKIE );
                              }
                              if( $Mode & SESSION )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_SESSION );
                              }
                              if( $Mode & SERVER )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_SERVER );
                              }
                              if( $Mode & KEYS )
                              {
                                    $Data = array_keys( $Data );
                                    $FilterFunction = create_function( '$e' , "return( strpos( \$e , '$Field' ) === 0 );" );
                                    $Data = array_filter( $Data , $FilterFunction );
                                    
                                    $Data2 = array();
                                    
                                    foreach( $Data as $d )
                                    {
                                          $Data2 [] = str_replace( $Field , '' , $d );
                                    }
                                    
                                    return( $Data2 );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Data2 = array();
                                    
                                    foreach( $Data as $k => $v )
                                    {
                                          if( strpos( $k , $Field ) === 0 )
                                          {
                                                $Data2[ str_replace( $Field , '' , $k ) ] = $v;
                                          }
                                    }
                                    
                                    return( $this->get( $Data2 , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        if( $Mode & POST )
                        {
                              if( $this->get_p( $Field , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    return( $this->get_p( $Field , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( $Mode & GET )
                        {
                              if( $this->get_g( $Field , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    return( $this->get_g( $Field , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( $Mode & COOKIE )
                        {
                              if( $this->get_c( $Field , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    return( $this->get_c( $Field , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( $Mode & SESSION )
                        {
                              if( $this->get_s( $Field , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    return( $this->get_s( $Field , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( $Mode & SERVER )
                        {
                              if( $this->get_srv( $Field , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    return( $this->get_srv( $Field , $Type ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        if( $Type === 'set' )
                        {
                              return( false );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              if( $DefaultValue === '_throw_exception' )
                              {
                                    throw( new Exception( "Field '$Field' was not found" ) );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    return( $DefaultValue );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( isset( $Array[ $Field ] ) )
                        {
                              if( $Type === 'set' )
                              {
                                    return( true );
                              }
                              return( $this->get( $Array[ $Field ] , $Type ) );
                        }
                        if( $Type === 'set' )
                        {
                              return( false );
                        }
                        else
                        {

parse_parameters ( $  Params,
$  ParsingScript,
$  GlobalPredicates = '' 
)

Function parses input parameters.

Parameters:
$Params - Array of values to parse.
$ParsingScript - Parsing script.
$GlobalPredicates - Global predicates.
Returns:
Object or array.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 113 of file security.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $GlobalPredicates = explode( ',' , $GlobalPredicates );
                        
                        $Result = new stdClass();
                        
                        $ParsingScript = str_replace( '#' , ';' , $ParsingScript );
                        $Script = explode( ';' , $ParsingScript );
                        
                        foreach( $Script as $s )
                        {
                              $s = explode( ':' , $s );
                              $FieldName = $s[ 0 ];
                              $Predicates = array_unique( array_merge( explode( ',' , $s[ 1 ] ) , $GlobalPredicates ) );
                              
                              $ValueWasSet = is_field_set( $Params , $FieldName );
                              if( $ValueWasSet === false )
                              {
                                    if( $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
                                    {
                                          $Default = $this->SecurityUtilities->get_default( $FieldName , $Predicates );

                                          if( $Default !== false )
                                          {
                                                set_field( $Result , $FieldName , $Default );
                                          }
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $s = serialize( $s );
                                          throw( new Exception( "Field \"$FieldName\" must be set, but it has not been set in $s" ) );
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Value = get_field( $Params , $FieldName );
                                    $Type = $this->SupportedDataTypes->get_type( $Predicates );
                                    $Alias = $this->SecurityUtilities->get_alias( $FieldName , $Predicates );
                                    
                                    set_field( $Result , $FieldName , $this->get( $Value , $Type ) );
                                    set_field( $Result , $Alias , get_field( $Result , $FieldName ) );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( $Result );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

validate_custom_fields ( $  ValidatingData,
$  ParsingScript 
)

Function validates array with data.

Parameters:
$ValidatingData - Array with validating data.
$ParsingScript - Validation script.
Returns:
true if the validation was passed, false otherwise.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 270 of file security.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->ErrorMessage = false;
                        $ParsingScript = str_replace( '#' , ';' , $ParsingScript );
                        $Script = explode( ';' , $ParsingScript );

                        foreach( $Script as $s )
                        {
                              $s = explode( ':' , $s );
                              $FieldName = $s[ 0 ];
                              $Predicates = explode( ',' , $s[ 1 ] );
                              $c = count( $Predicates );
                              for( $j = 0 ; $j < $c ; $j++ )
                              {
                                    switch( $Predicates[ $j ] )
                                    {
                                          case( 'email' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );

                                                if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                
                                                if( $Value == '' || $this->get( $Value , 'email' ) != $Value )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'float' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
                                                
                                                if( $Value === '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                
                                                if( $Value === '' || $this->get( $Value , 'float' ) != $Value )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'integer' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
                                                
                                                if( $Value === '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                
                                                if( $Value === '' || $this->get( $Value , 'integer' ) != $Value )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'raw' ):
                                          case( 'string' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
                                                
                                                if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) === false )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'command' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
                                                
                                                if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                
                                                if( $this->get( $Value , 'command' ) != $Value )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'set' ):
                                                if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === false )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'not_set' ):
                                                if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === true )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'not_filled' ):
                                                $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
                                                if( $Value != '' )
                                                {
                                                      $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                      return( false );
                                                }
                                          break;
                                          case( 'allow_not_set' ):
                                                # nop
                                          break;
                                          default:
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'default_' ) !== false )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( $Predicates[ $j ] === 'set' )
                                                {
                                                      if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === false )
                                                      {
                                                            $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                            return( false );
                                                      }
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'value_' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      $Value = str_replace( 'value_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] );
                                                      if( $this->get( @$ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) != $Value )
                                                      {
                                                            $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                            return( false );
                                                      }
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'min_' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      $Value = intval( str_replace( 'min_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] ) );
                                                      if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) < $Value )
                                                      {
                                                            $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                            return( false );
                                                      }
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'max_' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      $Value = intval( str_replace( 'max_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] ) );
                                                      if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) > $Value )
                                                      {
                                                            $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                            return( false );
                                                      }
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'same_as_' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      $SecondField = str_replace( 'same_as_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] );
                                                      if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) !== 
                                                            $this->get( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $SecondField ] , 'raw' ) , 'raw' ) )
                                                      {
                                                            $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
                                                            return( false );
                                                      }
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'err_msg_' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      continue;
                                                }
                                                throw( new Exception( "Undefined predicate '".$Predicates[ $j ]."'" ) );
                                          break;
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( true );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

validate_fields ( $  ParsingScript  ) 

Function validates form fields.

Parameters:
$ParsingScript - Validation script.
Returns:
true if the validation was passed, false otherwise.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
